block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This is Paper plane 16 of our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. Hunter designed by Kunihiko Kasahara. This is an origami plane folded from a square sheet. If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 015 : Tri Plane by Nick Robinson", you could watch it at https://youtu.be/e9fm86pwLGo Here at Heap Art, we are trying to help you to start practicing origami. Experiences or New, I'm sure you'll find something interesting on my channel. If you like origami and if you like paper airplanes, please remember to subscribe. I will be delivering something new to you every week. Use the following link to subscribe to my channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/heapart?sub_confirmation=1 My Upload Schedule: Tuesday : A new Paper Airplane, part of my 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge Friday : A new Origami Model never seen before on my channel Thanks for watching.
